cards.name: Orc Sureshot
cards.oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

cards.name: Reckless Fireweaver
cards.oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.

cards.name: Orzhov Charm
cards.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Return target creature you control and all Auras you control attached to it to their owner's hand.
• Destroy target creature and you lose life equal to its toughness.
• Return target creature card with mana value 1 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.name: Squad Commander
cards.oracle_text:
When Squad Commander enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Kor Warrior creature token for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you have a full party, creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain indestructible until end of turn.

cards.name: Archetype of Endurance
cards.oracle_text:
Creatures you control have hexproof.
Creatures your opponents control lose hexproof and can't have or gain hexproof.

cards.name: Psychic Corrosion
cards.oracle_text: Whenever you draw a card, each opponent mills two cards.

cards.name: Vorel of the Hull Clade
cards.oracle_text: {G}{U}, {T}: Double the number of each kind of counter on target artifact, creature, or land.

cards.name: Unburial Rites
cards.oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

cards.name: Silumgar Sorcerer
cards.oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying
Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)
When Silumgar Sorcerer exploits a creature, counter target creature spell.

cards.name: Hangarback Walker
cards.oracle_text:
Hangarback Walker enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Hangarback Walker dies, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying for each +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.
{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Hangarback Walker.

cards.name: Novijen, Heart of Progress
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{G}{U}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature that entered the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Worship
cards.oracle_text: If you control a creature, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.

cards.name: Acidic Slime
cards.oracle_text:
Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
When Acidic Slime enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

cards.name: Omniscience
cards.oracle_text: You may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs.

cards.name: Slaughter Pact
cards.oracle_text:
Destroy target nonblack creature.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{B}. If you don't, you lose the game.

cards.name: Jhessian Thief
cards.oracle_text:
Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
Whenever Jhessian Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

cards.name: Urabrask the Hidden
cards.oracle_text:
Creatures you control have haste.
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

cards.name: Stoneshaker Shaman
cards.oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.

cards.name: Clever Impersonator
cards.oracle_text: You may have Clever Impersonator enter the battlefield as a copy of any nonland permanent on the battlefield.

cards.name: Soulless Jailer
cards.oracle_text:
Permanent cards in graveyards can't enter the battlefield.
Players can't cast noncreature spells from graveyards or exile.

cards.name: Shrine of the Forsaken Gods
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast colorless spells. Activate only if you control seven or more lands.

cards.name: Blast from the Past
cards.oracle_text:
Madness {R}, cycling {1}{R}, kicker {2}{R}, flashback {3}{R}, buyback {4}{R}
Blast from the Past deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

cards.name: Pristine Skywise
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Pristine Skywise. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

cards.name: Market Festival
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional two mana in any combination of colors.

cards.name: Riku of Two Reflections
cards.oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may pay {U}{R}. If you do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {G}{U}. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

cards.name: Commander's Sphere
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

cards.name: Kykar, Wind's Fury
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.
Sacrifice a Spirit: Add {R}.

cards.name: Vampire Nighthawk
cards.oracle_text: Flying, deathtouch, lifelink

cards.name: Marchesa, the Black Rose
cards.oracle_text:
Dethrone (Whenever this creature attacks the player with the most life or tied for most life, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Other creatures you control have dethrone.
Whenever a creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

cards.name: Flying Crane Technique
cards.oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control. They gain flying and double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Mystifying Maze
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Exile target attacking creature an opponent controls. At the beginning of the next end step, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

cards.name: Hoarding Dragon
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle.
When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

cards.name: Cloud Key
cards.oracle_text:
As Cloud Key enters the battlefield, choose artifact, creature, enchantment, instant, or sorcery.
Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

cards.name: Damnable Pact
cards.oracle_text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

cards.name: Twinferno
cards.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• When you next cast an instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
• Target creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

cards.name: Banisher Priest
cards.oracle_text: When Banisher Priest enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Banisher Priest leaves the battlefield. (That creature returns under its owner's control.)

cards.name: Arid Mesa
cards.oracle_text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Arid Mesa: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.name: Temple of Mystery
cards.oracle_text:
Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Mystery enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

cards.name: Braids, Cabal Minion
cards.oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices an artifact, creature, or land.

cards.name: Shape of the Wiitigo
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Shape of the Wiitigo enters the battlefield, put six +1/+1 counters on enchanted creature.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature if it attacked or blocked since your last upkeep. Otherwise, remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

cards.name: Force of Despair
cards.oracle_text:
If it's not your turn, you may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy all creatures that entered the battlefield this turn.

cards.name: Light Up the Stage
cards.oracle_text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

cards.name: Strip Mine
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}, Sacrifice Strip Mine: Destroy target land.

cards.name: Backup Plan
cards.oracle_text:
(Start the game with this conspiracy face up in the command zone.)
Draw an additional hand of seven cards as the game begins. Before taking mulligans, shuffle all but one of your hands into your library.

cards.name: Carpet of Flowers
cards.oracle_text: At the beginning of each of your main phases, if you haven't added mana with this ability this turn, you may add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Islands target opponent controls.

cards.name: Lumberknot
cards.oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Lumberknot.

cards.name: Invoke Justice
cards.oracle_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of creatures and/or Vehicles target player controls.

cards.name: Clifftop Retreat
cards.oracle_text:
Clifftop Retreat enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Plains.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}.

cards.name: Rogue's Passage
cards.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

cards.name: Flood Plain
cards.oracle_text:
Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
